text:
The fix of 39695 was wrong . 
Local Variable Type Table does not appears in generated method . 
Additionally , Local Variable Table now contains only entries with generic 
types
Even though the .class file is now in correct format and does not cause 
ClassFormatError , information is missing , meaning that it will be imposible 
to debug in some cases .
creator: sfts@t2.technion.ac.il

text: Do you think you could provide a patch for it?
creator: tcurdt@apache.org

text: Just committed a fix in that area. Would be great if you could re-test.
creator: tcurdt@apache.org
